quoteText: Complaining doesn't change a thing only taking action does.
You get peace of mind not by thinking about it or imagining it, but by quietening and relaxing the restless mind.
The secret of joy in work is contained in one word â€” excellence. To know how to do something well is to enjoy it.
The whole secret of existence is to have no fear. Never fear what will become of you, depend on no one. Only the moment you reject all help are you freed.
The cosmos is neither moral or immoral; only people are. He who would move the world must first move himself.
He who conquers others is strong; He who conquers himself is mighty.
Sometimes the most important thing in a whole day is the rest we take between two deep breaths.
Joy is the best makeup.
The difficulties of life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
Our greatness lies not so much in being able to remake the world as being able to remake ourselves.
If you're feeling low, don't despair. The sun has a sinking spell every night, but it comes back up every morning. The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.
It is better to understand a little than to misunderstand a lot.
Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds.
You have to think anyway, so why not think big?
I allow my intuition to lead my path.
Lose an hour in the morning, and you will spend all day looking for it.
Trouble is only opportunity in work clothes.
The height of your accomplishments will equal the depth of your convictions.
Remember that failure is an event, not a person.
There are things so deep and complex that only intuition can reach it in our stage of development as human beings.
We know the truth, not only by the reason, but by the heart.
If you look over your left shoulder and it is saying to go this and your other shoulder is telling you to go the other way. Then just follow your heart and you will be OK.
Listen to what you know instead of what you fear.
Well done is better than well said.
The world cares very little about what a man or woman knows; it is what a man or woman is able to do that counts.
Adversity causes some men to break, others to break records.
A rolling stone gathers no moss.
Someone remembers, someone cares; your name is whispered in someone's prayers.
Always tell the truth. That way, you don't have to remember what you said.
